description: Example Claude Code settings with flexible permissions for .NET development. Copy this to settings.local.json to use.

allowedPrompts.prompt: run read-only git commands (status, diff, log)
run read-only file operations (cat, head, tail)

_comments.usage: Copy this file to .claude/settings.local.json to apply these permissions
what_this_enables: File operations: Read, Write, Edit any file without approval
Code search: Glob and Grep operations
Web research: WebSearch and WebFetch for documentation lookup
Task management: TodoWrite for tracking progress, Task for specialized agents
Planning: EnterPlanMode/ExitPlanMode for complex feature design
Git (read-only + staging): status, diff, log, add (commits/branches still require approval)
.NET development: All dotnet commands (build, test, restore, clean, run, publish, pack)
File system: Directory navigation and read-only file operations
what_requires_approval: Any other git commands not explicitly allowed
